summary: Timeline_1 chronicles struggles with self-harm and the path to recovery through support groups and therapy.

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. Nothing will ever get better I stopped taking my medication I know I need help so I started going to therapy My therapist suggested I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm tired of existing I'm failing at everything Managed to shower and eat breakfast. reached out to my therapist Small steps are still steps forward. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I'm tired of existing Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I've been having suicidal thoughts But I remembered my safety plan took my medication as prescribed and texted my sponsor. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I'm worthless and pathetic I'm worthless. I hurt myself again Did one small thing today - made my bed. reached out for help Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I'm broken beyond repair I'm failing at everything But yesterday I finally practiced my coping strategies and scheduled an appointment. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I want to give up on everything I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I'm failing at everything Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. called the crisis hotline Taking a mental health day tomorrow. I'm not giving up
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. reached out to my therapist I'm working on self-compassion Had a bad moment yesterday. I deserve to suffer But I worked through it using my tools. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I want to give up on everything I pushed everyone away Started using the coping strategies from therapy. joined a support group I'm trying to be patient with myself. I'm being patient with myself
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm worthless and pathetic My performance has been terrible. I don't care about anything anymore Met with HR about accommodations. called the crisis hotline They're being supportive. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm disgusting I feel like I'm ruining everything. I stopped taking my medication We decided to try couples therapy. asked for support Had our first session and it went better than expected. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. I'm disgusting All this therapy for nothing. I can't get out of bed anymore My therapist reminded me how far I've come. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm not giving up
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. Life is meaningless I gave up trying My partner has been incredibly supportive. wrote in my journal Learning to accept help and love. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I'm broken beyond repair I stopped taking my medication Forced myself to go for a walk today talked to a friend about what I'm going through and called my sister. I'm worth the effort
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I have no reason to keep going I can't get out of bed anymore Managed to shower and eat breakfast. asked for support Small steps are still steps forward. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I deserve to suffer I hate myself for it. I can't get out of bed anymore Called my therapist this morning used my DBT skills and we talked through it. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
